definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: A Confederate boat carried Fox to Sumter.
sentences.chinese: 一艘邦聯的船隻將福克斯運送到薩姆特堡。

sentences.english: However, Sir Gus deplored Dr Fox's judgment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，奧唐奈對福克斯的決斷深表遺憾。

sentences.english: The aircraft uses the Foxhunter multi-mode air-intercept radar to detect and target hostile aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 該機採用福克斯特多模空中攔截雷達探測和目標敵機。

sentences.english: This opposition in the cabinet caused Lincoln to postpone action on the Fox plan.
sentences.chinese: 由於內閣成員的反對導致林肯推遲了實施福克斯計劃。

sentences.english: We don't know if, or when, Megan Fox will ever receive a major acting award.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道梅根福克斯什麼時候得到了重大的表演獎。

sentences.english: She also accused the protests of being "backed" by FOX.
sentences.chinese: 她又指控此次抗議是由福克斯背後操控的。

sentences.english: That's more than I can say for the children of Sun Forks origined in this town for generations.
sentences.chinese: 在福克斯鎮上幾代都找不出這樣有教養的孩子。

sentences.english: In all-day viewing, Fox News rose 26 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在全天收視率調查中，福克斯新聞上升26%。

sentences.english: NBC and Fox were neck-and-neck for second place.
sentences.chinese: 美國國家廣播公司同福克斯公司並駕齊驅排在第二位。

sentences.english: Jia QInglin conveyed the greetings of President Hu Jintao to President Fox.
sentences.chinese: 賈慶林轉達了胡錦濤主席對福克斯總統的問候。

sentences.english: A small town named Forks exists under a near-constant cover of clounds.
sentences.chinese: 一個叫福克斯的小鎮總是陰雨連綿。

sentences.english: For more informa'tion on the Ter'ry Fox Foun'da'tion, click here.
sentences.chinese: 爲更多的信息在特里福克斯基礎上，單擊這裏。

sentences.english: You probably remember the scene of Megan Fox fixing Bumblebee in Transformers.
sentences.chinese: 你也許記得，梅根福克斯現場固定在變壓器野蜂。

sentences.english: By 1920, Fox and Universal were already names to conjure with.
sentences.chinese: 到1920年，福克斯和環球已經聲名顯赫。

sentences.english: Fox is on the roll in the love department.
sentences.chinese: 福克斯是愛情部的一員。

sentences.english: Fawkes was to light the fuse and escape to continental Europe.
sentences.chinese: 福克斯負責點燃導火索，然後逃往歐洲大陸。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Time Warner Inc., US media company
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
